mutants.code:
def minimum_button_presses(N, A, B):
    s = 1
    for i in range(N - 1, -1, -1):
        A_i = A[i]
        B_i = B[i]
        x = (A_i + s + B_i - 1) // B_i
        s += x * B_i - (A_i + s)
    return s

def minimum_button_presses(N, A, B):
    s = -1
    for i in range(N - 1, -1, -1):
        A_i = A[i]
        B_i = B[i]
        x = (A_i + s + B_i - 1) // B_i
        s += x * B_i - (A_i + s)
    return s
